name: Danger Ahead (itch) (Thomasiscool2521)
description:
THIS GAME IS CURRENTLY IN BETA STUFF IS SUBJECT TO CHANGE OR BE REWORKED

this is a vr survival game where you have to survive in VR!! ya you guessed it

if you want to see updates and spoilers go join out discord: https://discord.gg/56Rq3pmYB8

You can Craft, by combining things

you can kill with weapons

you can mine and break stuff with tools, pickaxe, axe, and shovel

and build with blocks(NOT MINECRAFT)

game made in unreal engine
